title: Reincarnated Villainess Does Not Want Revenge - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Broken Engagement   Depictions of Cruelty   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Master-Servant Relationship   Otome Game   Reincarnated in a Game World   Revenge   Siblings   Villainess Noble Girls   Yandere
author: あかこ
description:
Rosemary, who was hanged for innocent charges, made a name for herself as a villainess.

Rosemary, who reincarnated and remembered the memories of her previous life, hoped to live peacefully this time from the experience in her previous life.

However, contrary to Rosemary's wishes, Rosemary returned to the royal palace.

'Come on, sister. How do you want to discipline those who killed you?'

Her younger brother, who had been loving during his lifetime, had completely changed and was about to take revenge on behalf of his sister.

'My Lord. Please tell me what you want.'

The knight who swore allegiance in her previous life swore allegiance even in this world.

I didn't think of revenge for the person who once killed me.

But the people around me didn't allow it...>
